Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​ComponentsTreeViewModel
ViewModelBase
public
Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​ComponentsTreeViewModel

ComponentsTreeViewModel class stores the logic & data of the ComponentsTreeView.  The main goal of the ComponentsTreeViewModel is to link between the data which related to the components dependency model to the UI components.  This class inherits from Galasoft.MvvmLight.ViewModelBase which is the base class for any ViewModel in MVVM pattern.

private readonly DataState m_dataState

Properties
IsComponentNotSelected
public bool IsComponentNotSelected { get }

Gets a value indicating whether the user selected any component.

true if the user selected a component; otherwise, false.

Gets a value indicating whether the health monitoring module data is loaded.

true if this data is loaded; otherwise, false.
